nodes.text: A secretary droid was a type of droid used to perform basic clerical work. The CZ-series secretary/business communications droid was an example of this type of droid. One of the most notable secretary droid was CZ-1G5, a CZ unit who was located at Niima Outpost for over three hundred years and helped the Kubaz banker Rikard Lovas carry out a devilish plan to help him make money.
